subject: RE: [junit] JDK 1.1.8 and JUnit
msgSnippet: Francois: I can confirm: JUnit 3.7 works under JDK 1.1.8a (on NT and S/390) Best Regards, Michael Dean Sun Certified Programmer for the Java 2 Platform OMNI
messageBody:
Francois: I can confirm: JUnit 3.7 works under JDK 1.1.8a (on NT and S/390)

Best Regards,

Michael Dean
Sun Certified Programmer for the Java 2 Platform
OMNI Project
Washington State Department of Corrections

"Courage is the price that life exacts
for granting peace."
- Amelia Earhart



-----Original Message-----
From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbr@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 20, 2001 4:19 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] JDK 1.1.8 and JUnit


As for as I know, they all do. If 3.7 does not work, try 3.5 or earlier.

JBR.

Francois Beausoleil wrote:

> Hello everyone,
>
> I would like to know which version of JUnit works under JDK 1.1.8 ? I
> have a
> project that must run under Lotus Notes and Notes implements the 1.1.8
> JVM.
>
> Thank you,
> Francois Beausoleil
>
